content: this pattern consists of a spiral and 7 legs the spiral is done in the round but to make legs you have to turn your work after each row i made the splash carpet and a coaster using different weights of string to make the carpet approx 140x135 cm you will need * approximately 600 meters of cotton string 4 or 5 mm thick * a 9 mm crochet hook it s the m or n size in the us * about 6 hours of your time the coaster approx 77x72 cm requires * about 300 meters of cotton string 2 mm thick * a 5 mm crocheting hook it s size h in the us * about 3-4 hours of your time no matter what string you use remember one important thing the crochet hook needs to be twice as thick as the string otherwise your work will come out crooked it will also wobble or buckle
